Articles.Content:
Platform: Xbox One

Date occured: 2/18/18

 

Space center after loading up the game shows stars, space, etc. seeing the tabs on the left side and everything works there, buildings load up.

 

Only other thing is once you launch a space crat, the ground is invisible, the entire planet doesnt exist, map view shows nothing but space, no sun, no planets, or anything. Not sure what to do, I hope my save isn't corrupted.  Idk what to do about this situation.
Have you tried quitting and restarting the game? Is it affecting all your save files?
I had the same issue Monday night. when I reset xbox and rebooted game I'd lost an entire crew and 3 contracts.not happy bunny

Generally this seems to happen in the January release when you mess around with the Xbox button while the game is loading.

If you have the new release, please retest and see if you can make it happen.
